RelatedSentence: ( MENAFN - Qatar News Agency ) Ijing may 18 ( qna ) - china southern airlines the country 's largest airline by fleet size has signed contracts with aircraft manufacturer airbus for the purchase of 80 a320 planes airbus china said .

A0: a320 planes with price between 85.8 million us dollars and 110.1 million us dollars each and 50 of the more energy-efficient a320neo model with price between 94.4 million us dollars and 120 million us
RelatedSentence: the planes will be delivered to china southern airlines from 2016 to 2020 according to china 's ( xinhua ) news agency .
